targets.query: from(bucket: "system-metrics") |> range(start: -1h) |> filter(fn: (r) => r._measurement == "cpu") |> filter(fn: (r) => r._field == "cpu_percent")
from(bucket: "system-metrics") |> range(start: -1h) |> filter(fn: (r) => r._measurement == "memory") |> filter(fn: (r) => r._field == "memory_percent")
from(bucket: "system-metrics") |> range(start: -1h) |> filter(fn: (r) => r._measurement == "disk_usage") |> filter(fn: (r) => r._field == "percent")
from(bucket: "system-metrics") |> range(start: -1h) |> filter(fn: (r) => r._measurement == "network_io") |> filter(fn: (r) => r._field == "network_bytes_sent" or r._field == "network_bytes_recv")
from(bucket: "system-metrics") |> range(start: -5m) |> filter(fn: (r) => r._measurement == "cpu") |> filter(fn: (r) => r._field == "cpu_percent") |> last()
